channel.title: FP on CozyDev
channel.description: Recent content in FP on CozyDev

item.title: imperative | declarative
item.description: Imperative HOW you do something Imperative programming is a paradigm describing HOW the program should do something by explicitly specifying each instruction (or statement) step by step, which mutate the program’s state. Functional programming 是 Declarative Paradigm 的代表，邏輯為用較為抽象的程式碼，理解程式碼想要達到怎樣的目標，F
